messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: A single swarmer is inside the station. Destroy it as soon as you see it before it eats the whole station up.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Good job disposing the Swarmer, we bluespaced in a bunch of pizzas at the Kitchen.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Locker Room.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard Doctor's Monitor Juliet. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard Doctor's Monitor Juliet. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Doctor's Monitor Juliet, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Biohazard has reached critical mass. Station loss is imminent.
